name: Classic Lemonade
description: A classic simple lemonade with balanced sweetness and acidity.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fresh juice from 10 to 12 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lemon juice and sugar and whisk or blend until sugar is completely dissolved. Add salt and water and stir to combine. Pour into a pitcher with ice. Serve in ice-filled glasses.
